doc.title: Great Russian Composers: Peter Tchaikovsky
doc.plot: Peter Tchaikovsky was the leading Russian composer of the late 19th century, whose works are notable for their melodic orchestration. His works included Piano Concerto No. 1., Eugene Onegin, the ballets Swan Lake and The Sleeping Beauty, the Violin Concerto in D Major, Symphony No. 4 and No 5, The 1812 Overture and many others.
